           throws java.lang.Exception

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops the application by stopping bluetooth server and joining its thread before returning. This method should be called to close the application properly
        Overrides:
        stop in class javafx.application.Application
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs with the thread
